price: Inni waan dalagu irraa hin gaafatamu; isaan immoo ni gaafatamu.
arabic: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā yus'alu ʿammā yafʿalu wahum yus'alūna
